posts.post_content: Good combo - have 4 of these in your deck, and an [Iname, Death aspect](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Iname, Death aspect). Put them all in your graveyard, and then play a [Twilight's Call](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Twilight's Call), or some other such graveyard-to-play. For the full effect, combo it with [Relic of Progenitus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Relic of Progenitus)!
posts.html:
